description: Returns auto scaling related settings of the specified table in JSON format. If the table is a multi-Region table, the Amazon Web Services Region specific auto scaling settings of the table are included. Amazon Keyspaces auto scaling helps you provision throughput capacity for variable workloads efficiently by increasing and decreasing your table's read and write capacity automatically in response to application traffic. For more information, see Managing throughput capacity automatically with Amazon Keyspaces auto scaling in the Amazon Keyspaces Developer Guide. To define permissions for GetTableAutoScalingSettings, you must allow the following two actions in the IAM policy statement's Action element:

nested_items.name: keyspaceName
nested_items.description: The name of the keyspace.

nested_items.name: tableName
nested_items.description: The name of the table.

nested_items.name: resourceArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the table.

nested_items.name: autoScalingSpecification
nested_items.description: The auto scaling settings of the table.

nested_items.name: writeCapacityAutoScaling
nested_items.description: The auto scaling settings for the table's write capacity.

nested_items.name: autoScalingDisabled
nested_items.description: This optional parameter enables auto scaling for the table if set to false.

nested_items.name: minimumUnits
nested_items.description: The minimum level of throughput the table should always be ready to support. The value must be between 1 and the max throughput per second quota for your account (40,000 by default).

nested_items.name: maximumUnits
nested_items.description: Manage costs by specifying the maximum amount of throughput to provision. The value must be between 1 and the max throughput per second quota for your account (40,000 by default).

nested_items.name: scalingPolicy
nested_items.description: Amazon Keyspaces supports the target tracking auto scaling policy. With this policy, Amazon Keyspaces auto scaling ensures that the table's ratio of consumed to provisioned capacity stays at or near the target value that you specify. You define the target value as a percentage between 20 and 90.

nested_items.name: targetTrackingScalingPolicyConfiguration
nested_items.description: Auto scaling scales up capacity automatically when traffic exceeds this target utilization rate, and then back down when it falls below the target. A double between 20 and 90.

nested_items.name: disableScaleIn
nested_items.description: Specifies if scale-in is enabled.

nested_items.name: scaleInCooldown
nested_items.description: Specifies a scale-in cool down period.

nested_items.name: scaleOutCooldown
nested_items.description: Specifies a scale out cool down period.

nested_items.name: targetValue
nested_items.description: Specifies the target value for the target tracking auto scaling policy.

nested_items.name: readCapacityAutoScaling
nested_items.description: The auto scaling settings for the table's read capacity.

nested_items.name: autoScalingDisabled
nested_items.description: This optional parameter enables auto scaling for the table if set to false.

nested_items.name: minimumUnits
nested_items.description: The minimum level of throughput the table should always be ready to support. The value must be between 1 and the max throughput per second quota for your account (40,000 by default).

nested_items.name: maximumUnits
nested_items.description: Manage costs by specifying the maximum amount of throughput to provision. The value must be between 1 and the max throughput per second quota for your account (40,000 by default).

nested_items.name: scalingPolicy

You define the target value as a percentage between 20 and 90.

nested_items.name: targetValue

nested_items.name: replicaSpecifications
nested_items.description: The Amazon Web Services Region specific settings of a multi-Region table. Returns the settings for all Regions the table is replicated in.

nested_items.name: region
nested_items.description: The Amazon Web Services Region.

nested_items.name: autoScalingSpecification
nested_items.description: The auto scaling settings for a multi-Region table in the specified Amazon Web Services Region.

nested_items.name: writeCapacityAutoScaling
nested_items.description: The auto scaling settings for the table's write capacity.

nested_items.name: autoScalingDisabled
nested_items.description: This optional parameter enables auto scaling for the table if set to false.
